pageProps.title: Using Prisma with GraphQL: Best Practices and Examples
pageProps.metaDesc: GraphQL has become one of the most popular ways to build APIs for modern web applications. Prisma, on the other hand, is a powerful ORM (Object Relational Mapping) tool that simplifies database management. Together, they can create a seamless experience for developers. In this article, we will explore the best practices of using Prisma with GraphQL, along with some examples.
